description: The Snow Trails Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Snow Trails for the snow report
Alexa, ask Snow Trails for latest conditions
imageAltText: Snow Report for Snow Trails icon
name: Snow Report for Snow Trails
shortDescription: The Snow Trails Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Snow Trails.
